sense.def:
Izraz
one's
uporabimo, če želimo povedati, da nekaj pripada ljudem na splošno ali se nanaša na ljudi na splošno.

seg.quote: Naturally, one wanted only the best for one's children.

sense.def:
One's
je tudi govorna oblika od
one is
ali
one has
, zlasti kadar je
has
pomožni glagol.

seg.quote: One's never quite sure exactly how things are going to turn out.
One's got to pay for it.
